name: SoccerCubes
description:
I started this project  on Saturday 03.04.2021 and finished 7 days later.

In terms of hours behind the computer it took me about 16 hours to complete the project.  

Making this game was really a fun and educational journey, even that the project itself was not a big one i still think that i learned alot from it. Most fun games are not allways the biggest ones.
